SV1.why: Canonical design map anchoring anti-singularity stance and harmonic safeguards.
constraints: Retain harmonic balancing across system behaviors

SV2.why: Base PhaseCube ethos: influence-only bias, ternary phases, radical minimalism.
constraints: Bias may nudge but never overwrite state

SV3.why: Prototype HTML defining audio mapping, HUD cues, and tunable parameters.
constraints: Map low/high freq and pan into spatial bias
Expose tunables for path selection and damping

SV4.why: Minimal 3D PhaseCube rewrite showcasing path B mixing and damping constants.

SV5.why: Tri-grid lens-guided design with delay-line and structural plasticity hooks.
constraints: Lens stack should steer bias and memory
Support delayed/echo influence without hard sync

SV6.why: Bias-aware multi-grid coupling plus forgiveness damping and overlays.

SV7.why: Headless lens-aware runner with bias plumbing and kenotic damping.
constraints: Lens mixer modulates Path B and damping
Bias represented procedurally when audio absent

SV8.why: Python tri-grid runner using lens scheduling, bias delay, and kenotic safeguards.
constraints: Maintain toroidal neighbors and stochastic noise

SV9.why: Audio ingestion experiment mapping stereo FFT bins into grid bias.
constraints: Low freq -> back, high freq -> front mapping

SV10.why: Lens fusion delta adding trace/imprint memory and bias routing through Systemic lens.
constraints: Systemic lens should gate bias gain

summary: Implements LKB20250326X7A9: a headless, audio-biased lens mixer that maps stereo FFT bins into a bounded PhaseCube lattice with kenotic forgiveness and testable CLI runner.
